page.title: 21Bus Service 2011
page.content:
The bus service operates at approximately hourly intervals from Monday to Saturday. Buses run from Shrewsbury bus station to Clive, Wem & Whitchurch and vice versa. The first bus leaves Shrewsbury bus station at 0720 and the last departure is at 18:05. In the opposite direction the first service from Clive to Shrewsbury is at 07:58 and the last 19:23. It is unfortunate that recent economies have resulted in concessionary passes being invalid before 09:30 ( except on Saturdays)

Source Scc bus route 511 timetable dated 19-04-11
Craig Love
